name: com.paulsams.searchable-attribute
description:
This package allows you to use the [Searchable] attribute, which implements a popup window with a search bar that enables you to quickly find the desired item.

For enum it works without any additional actions, and for custom solutions there is an ISearchableConverter  interface.

samples.displayName: Example Enum and One Custom Converter
samples.description: Enum and Item Types load from json
samples.path: Samples~/Example Enum and One Custom Converter
